definition: thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash
(of water) to dash against/to mix with water/to infuse/to rinse/to flush/to develop (a film)/to rise in the air/to clash/to collide with

sentences.chinese: 四冲程汽油在摩托车发动机。

sentences.english: Fuel efficiency equal to or better than four-strokes.
sentences.chinese: 等于或优于四冲程燃油效率。
单缸，四冲程，强制风冷发动机。

sentences.english: Deformation of helical buckling appeared on rod during down stroke is also analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 同时分析了下冲程抽油杆所产生的螺旋弯曲变形。

sentences.english: The four-stroke cycle which is in common use.
sentences.chinese: 这就是常用的四冲程循环。

sentences.english: It is a four-stroke inline turbo charged engine.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个四冲程直列增压发动机。

sentences.english: As engine rpm increases, there is less time for each step of the four- stroke cycle .
sentences.chinese: 当引擎转速增加，四冲程循环每一步的时间变得越短。

sentences.english: Liquid cooled four stroke, transverse four cylinder, DOHC, 4 valves per cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 液体冷却的四冲程，横向四缸，DOHC，4每缸。

sentences.english: The engine is four- stroke, air-cooled gasoline engine which is started by rebound starter and it can transmit smoothly without energy loss.
sentences.chinese: 发动机为四冲程空冷汽油机，靠反弹式起动器启动。

sentences.english: Less costly to manufacture than four-stroke engines.
sentences.chinese: 比四冲程发动机制造成本更低。

sentences.english: Liquid cooled, single cylinder two stroke.
Piston from one end to another end, called a stroke.
sentences.chinese: 活塞由一端移至另一端，称为一个冲程。

sentences.english: A lot of those small generators on the market are 2 stroke.
sentences.chinese: 阿市场上的小型发电机，不少都是二冲程。

sentences.english: The most common engine is the four-stroke piston engine.
sentences.chinese: 最罕见的发起机是四冲程活塞式发起机。

sentences.english: This is the four-stroke cycle which is in common use.
sentences.chinese: 这就是常用的四冲程循环。

definition: cylinder (of steam engine or internal combustion engine)
valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
backwards and forwards action (e.g. of piston or pump)/reciprocating motion
